summary: The module provides automated tests for a zero-shot text‑to‑video generation pipeline built on the SDXL model. It includes quick tests that run with lightweight dummy components to verify core functionality and performance optimizations, as well as comprehensive tests that execute the full pipeline on GPU to confirm end‑to‑end correctness, deterministic behavior, and proper resource management.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the reliability and quality of the AI‑driven text‑to‑video generation service before deployment, enabling early detection of regressions and ensuring the pipeline meets performance and resource‑usage expectations.
